Reviews.Title: GREAT for the price
Reviews.Author: R Lucas "R Lucas AZ"
Reviews.Content: My main concerns when purchasing this camera a few months ago were whether or not it would get good, stable images of my fast moving toddler (it does,) whether the pictures would be nice looking (they are-vivid life-like colors,) and whether it would hold up well for a few years of family use (the jury is still out on that one.) I am pleased that the between shot delay is minimal and that it was very easy to "get the hang of." I am very pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a decent point and shoot option for daily family life.

ProductInfo.Features:
compact and stylish camera body
2.7-inch LCD display
Extended light sensitivity as high as ISO 1600
14 different scene modes and three movie modes
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix L19 Digital Camera (Bright Magenta)
